0.1.0.Caching: More caching has been implemented for the *Deck Builder* page:/n- Selected **Faction** and **Sets** will stay selected until you change them;/n- Selected **cards** will stay selected until you save the deck or unselect them or click *RESET ALL* button;/n- Deck's **Name** and **Source** will be preserved until you change them or save the deck.
0.1.0.PWA: The app running from the homescreen will be set to the *last visited route* when re-started from homescreen or by comming from background (when you for example switched between the app and some other screen).
